ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: I wanna be a froglok shaman!  I wanna cast SoW indoors! Sylly p.s. and I thot that I heard they were gonna fix this one but last Saturday morning, right there
ygData.messageBody:
I wanna be a froglok shaman! I wanna cast SoW indoors!

Sylly

p.s. and I thot that I heard they were gonna fix this one but last Saturday
morning, right there in the Upper Guk Jail room... a froglok shaman begins
to cast a spell... a froglok shaman is surrounded by a brief lupine aura...

p.s.s. is it just me or how come Verant has such a low opinion of bards?
They design dungeons and populate them with these mobs: knights, warriors,
shamen, wizards, enchanters, etc. so where do they put the bards? Hello a
Sylly are you [interested] in helping deliver some [mail]?


-----Original Message-----
From: silky@...
[mailto:silky@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 11:33 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lute of the Gypsy Princess and
other lutes.

From: silky@...


Is it just me - or are some of the things NPCs allowed to do
that we can't
just really out of wack?

Seemingly endless manna
Seemingly limitless casting range
Able to affect folks WELL outside normal range limits
Able to have multiple pets

Lets see - anything I've forgotten?
